body: SDA, I don't know who those worthless pieces of shit are... but I appreciate your work, so thank you very much.
@(SDA) Slut Detection Agent a bit late as i just read this for the first time but thank you for your kind work.
Yeahhh..... I still cant get over it, lets burn it.
HisHoliness described what transpired in the first half of this story... is just a fanfic of a student, it didn’t happen...
Eewwwwwwwwww

(part 3 and final) This said, I wont put this chapter under favorite unlike the other chapters of the serie. Mostly cuz I dislike bald old men in my hentai. No, wait. I lied: I don't "dislike" bald old men in my hentai. I "absolutely hate" bald old men in my hentai. But that's just my preference. And it remember me that I'm going bald too, damn falling hairs. As I said "at each his own" (with legal reservation). And I'm sorry for some typo and maybe my writing form: I've teached myself the english language and while the structure is similar to my first language (italian), well, some tintage, form or shades of the languages probably wont mix too well.

(part 2) hadn't asked the MC for "help" and instead gone on another teacher. What I mean by mislabeling is puttin a "NTR" under "vanilla" tag (or viceversa) just to fu,ck with the reader. Or upload a really good drawed NTR (with this I mean a drawing style almost identical to the original author) doujinshi as a normal chapeter on a manga site. It happened to me once and I just couldn't continue to read the manga (soul eater if you are curious) afterward. Not even years later I could find in myself to start it again. And just after I quit on that site, since it didn't even bother to remove said chapter, I got wind that a good four points percentage of gains for the scanlator of the official manga were gone, while the scanlator of the NTR lost most of his follower (even if he didn't upload the chapter on that site) because he didn't bother to scanlate (or at least scan) the cover. Of the misterious uploader we still don't know anything. THAT is what I mean with mislabelling.

(Part1)Now, I'll sart pre-stating that I'm a vanilla man, so be warned. This will be followed by statin that I hate NTR, be warned again. Also I'll state that "at each his own" should be the fu.ck.ing way of life if we want something resembling peace anywhere. Within legal limit of course. You like NTR? Enjoy it. You try to rape/coerce/blackmail IRL a female/male/adult/child/others? You should be castrated with a rusty spoon. At midday while in public television on all the channles, without censorship. Just to lower a tad such happening and put the fear of God in said rapist/blackmailer/ecc. Now, I'll ultimately state that while hate is a strong word, I fu.ck.ing adhere to it on those sh.it head that publish something under wrong tag or site. Before the linch, let me explain: THIS one is not a case. This is a "IF", so not canon, moreover is a fanfiction/fantasy/tought/something not happened. Even if this was, since it's a "if", it mean it's an alternative reality, meaning Iris hadn't>>
The first part is a fanfic written by a student on the message board, not somerhing that actually happened
GG,  good after
And if this is cannon then I feel bad for that old man, main character prob got iris all loose
Or this is just non cannon cause I highly doubt the main char is that much of a cuck

I am assuming this is a imposter? Or a impersonator? Considering Iris's personality it can't be her. Either that or she was with that old dude before the main char, but that also makes no sense since she didn't get pregnant yet. But a imposter sounds the most reasonable considering this is a fantasy setting which means there might be a demi human who can shape shift.
